hero.title: Read RSS feeds while offline, in the sun!
hero.caption: ReaderFeeder delivers articles from your favorite RSS feeds to your Kindle Paperwhite, wirelessly, in full-text format, so you can read them anywhere, even in the sun, thanks to Kindle's E-Ink screen!

list.title: Sign up to ReaderFeeder
list.text: It's free and will take a minute. [Click here](/app) to proceed with the registration process.

list.title: Discover Feeds
list.text: Follow your favorite blogs, book authors, news sites. Everything you care about. Browse through our growing [rss feed collection](/app/feeds) and subscribe.

list.title: Go outside, read & relax
list.text: From now on, ReaderFeeder will be sending the feeds you've subscribed to to your Kindle, once a day, until you decide to cancel any of those subscriptions.
